text:
I knew that already~?
Hinana was there too.
Well... I think all of it was good...

But... like the part
with the confetti cut into candy shapes────

And... the staging with the balloons,
that was also nice and very Hinana-like.
Yeah~! It was cute, wasn't it~?

Thanks to Hinana's proactive suggestions,
the stage became really vibrant.

I'm just really happy that the audience could feel
that vibe too.

I think,
Hinana might be really good at this kind of thing.

Yeah~~~!
Hinana was thinking the same.
Hinana wants to do something like this again~!
